name: part_001
file: tmp_hololive production x DreamHack Melbourne 2024： Down Under [Free Preview] [IQqAbuGvDHM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: A pre-concert waiting loop for 'hololive production x DreamHack Melbourne 2024: Down Under'. The screen displays rotating announcements, safety warnings, and a penlight color guide for the performing artists.

subtitles.original: 開演までしばらくお待ちください
subtitles.english:
The concert will begin shortly.
Please wait for a moment.

subtitles.original:
PHOTOSENSITIVITY WARNING
PLEASE BE AWARE OF FLASHING LIGHTS THAT MAY
CAUSE DISCOMFORT AND/OR SEIZURES
subtitles.english:
PHOTOSENSITIVITY WARNING
PLEASE BE AWARE OF FLASHING LIGHTS THAT MAY
CAUSE DISCOMFORT AND/OR SEIZURES

subtitles.original:
演出の都合上
照明の点滅にご注意ください
subtitles.english:
Due to the nature of the production,
please be aware of flashing lights.

subtitles.original:
YOU ARE FREE TO TAKE SCREENSHOTS,
SCREEN RECORDINGS ARE NOT ALLOWED.
subtitles.english:
YOU ARE FREE TO TAKE SCREENSHOTS,
SCREEN RECORDINGS ARE NOT ALLOWED.

subtitles.original:
スクリーンショットをSNSにアップロード投稿OKです。
録音、録画、ミラー配信や違法アップロードは固く禁止いたします
subtitles.english:
Screenshots may be uploaded to social media.
Audio/video recording and streaming are prohibited.

subtitles.original:
PENLIGHT COLOURS
CALLIOPE: PINK / REINE: BLUE / BAELZ: RED
MARINE: RED / TOWA: PURPLE / OLLIE: RED
subtitles.english:
